name: Craigslist-jr-rails
tagline: Created a Craigslist-type web app while learning the Rails framework.
body:
**# Summary:**
This was my first attempt to create the front/back-end of an app in order to learn the Rails framework.
The app works similar to a Craiglist website: with categories of listings, and with each listing created by a user.
One key feature is that listings can only be edited by its author; this is accomplished by using a special key in the URL. Only the author knows the key and can go to the edit URL.

Gems used: 
* 'pg' for PostgreSQL
* 'faker' for Faker gem to generate fake user names, posts, comments. 

Authors: Uzma Rahman, Phillip Mispagel
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
